-=-=-=- Trijam-Info

Made In 3 Hours For : Trijam #191

Theme : Isolated

How Is It Related : 

You Play As A Magnet - Magnet Can Push other Magnets Away So the magnet will be Isolated

-=-=-=- Game-Info

puzzle Game 

Try To Finish All The Levels And Beat The BOSS 

Blocks : 

One Way Gate : A Gate That if you are the opposite Color it will attract you to it and teleport the other way

Iron : it Attracts you if You Come Near it and then you will not be able to move for 5s

it recharges after 10seconds

Spiker: A Spike That Moves From One Way To Another and If You Touch it You Lose

Magnet Turrent : A Turrent That Shoots Small Magnets That Can Interact With The One Way Gate

Red-Point/Blue-Point : Changes The Color Of The Player To Its Color

green-Point : if you Touch It You Win The Level

BOSS: A Big Turrent That Looks At The Player And Shoots 3 Magnets per time and cools down for 10 seconds then start all over again

-=-=-=- Controls

wasd/arrow keys to move

left Mouse Button To shoot Bullets (Only In Boss Level)

Go To The _How To Play_ section first to know how to play
